name: eulogy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a speech, piece of writing, poem, etc. containing great praise, especially for someone who recently died or retired from work: He was the most self-effacing of men - the last thing he would have relished was a eulogy. The song was a eulogy to the joys of travelling. Synonyms
encomium formal
panegyric formal
